{{Infobox/Jutsu |kanji=口寄せ・丸太転がし |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Kuchiyose: Maruta Korogashi |game names=Summoning: Rolling Logs
Summoning Jutsu - Stump |parent jutsu=Summoning Technique, |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu, Space–Time Ninjutsu, |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short, Mid, Long |users=Rin Nohara, |boruto=No |debut shippuden=No |game debut=Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 |jutsu media=Game }} Rin quickly performs a few [[hand seals]], then summons a large rolling log which slams all opponents that are within a short distance in front of her.
